title: JSON Schema for Plugable Tray (ptray) specification files

interval.description: The interval in seconds of the execution

command.description: The command to run, it should provide some output, if the command returns nothing or the error code is not zero, the specification fails

items.description: Every array element is one part of th command separated by space and without quotes

filter.description: The strategy (only one should be provided) to filter the result provided by the command, the output of this step is a dict of strings

all.description: The result will be used entirely as as single string by the next steps, outputs a dict with the 0 key and the entire output as value

lines.description: Only the received lines will be extracted from the result, outputs a dict with the line indices as key and lines strings as values, if there are missing lines, the specification fails

items.description: The line indices to select, starting from 0, the indices should ve unique and contained in the command output size, otherwise, the specification fails

match.description: Search for matches in the command output with a python pattern (https://docs.python.org/3/library/re.html), outputs a dict with found order as key and matched strings as values, if matches nothing, the specification fails

extract.description: Extracts helpful information from the filtered dicts using patterns

key.description: The index selector, can be a number, a range (can be open on the two sides), or an array of numbers, unselected indices are discarded, at least one index must match, otherwise the specification fails

data.description: The data extractor, can be an array of regular expressions with their labels, a single string pattern with named groups (every group name is a label) or null (the entire line is returned with the data label), if no groups are found, the specification fails

items.description: A label and a regular expression to extract data
